price: 32 Puisse Notre Seigneur, en qui nous plaçons tous nos espoirs, nous accorder mieux que ce verger ! »
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbunā an yub'dilanā khayran min'hā innā ilā rabbinā rāghibūna
